subdisciplines.name: Computer Architecture
subdisciplines.description: The study of how computer systems are designed and how they operate.

subdisciplines.name: Computer Networks
subdisciplines.description: The study of how networks of computers communicate with each other.

subdisciplines.name: Computer Security
subdisciplines.description: The study of how to protect computer systems from unauthorized access or attacks.

subdisciplines.name: Software Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study of how to design, develop, and maintain software systems.
